data.title: What's On
data.text:
**Wild Events Programme**

Wild Talks

Tickets: Free, book tickets.

Location: Kanaris Theatre, Manchester Museum, Oxford Road.

Wild Talks

Wondrous & WILD

Tickets: Free, drop in.

Location: Manchester Museum, Oxford Road

Wondrous & WILD

*Exhibitions*

Exhibitions and displays explore the richness of our world and our past, present and future.

Wild

Our bold new exhibition, opening on 5 June 2024, looks at how we can go 'wild' to tackle the climate and biodiversity crisis.

Tickets: Free, booking required

Location: Exhibition Hall, ground floor

Wild

A Sense of Flora

Tickets: Free, drop in.

Location: The Top Floor, Manchester Museum, Oxford Road

A Sense of Flora

*Summer 2024*

Origins and Innovations: historic campus tours

Tickets: Free

Location: University of Manchester campus

Origins and Innovations: historic campus tours

Wild in the museum tours

Tickets: Free, no booking necessary.

Location: Manchester Museum, Oxford Road

Wild in the museum tours

Pride Tours

Join us for our regular Pride Tours of Manchester Museum - our Visitor Team will take you on a journey through the museum, bringing new voices to the collections.

Tickets: Free, drop-in event

Location: Manchester Museum, Oxford Road

Pride Tours
